name: Solar Flare (itch) (RanandaVheo)
description:
A solar storm has overtaken the space station!

Every ten seconds, a deadly solar flare will KILL you!

Jump around the station from safe zone to safe zone as you collect all 10 toolkits and make it to the generator on the other side! You’re our only hope!!! Oh, and don’t forget to come back…!
